main.java.controllerandview.windowcontrollers

Class WindowControllerCommon

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.controllerandview.windowcontrollers.WindowControllerCommon

  • public class WindowControllerCommon
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds static methods used by other Window Controllers

    • Method Detail

      • setupDefaultColumnActionsInControllerPositionsWindow

        public static void setupDefaultColumnActionsInControllerPositionsWindow(ControllerPositionsWindow controllerPositionsWindow)
        Can be called by onitialize() - sets up the default actions of the columns. User can later change what each column does.
        Parameters:
        controllerPositionsWindow - the window in which we want to setup the default column actions

      • setupSimpleScalperInColumn

        public static ControllerSimpleScalperAlgo setupSimpleScalperInColumn(ControllerPositionsWindow controllerPositionsWindow,
                                                                     int columnNumber)
        Convenience method for setting up columns in ControllerPositionsWindow. Sets up a SimpleScalperAlgo in the column specified and returns the controller of the algo
        Parameters:
        controllerPositionsWindow -
        columnNumber - the column in MikeGridPane where we want the algo setup. first column in number 1 not zero!
        Returns:

      • setupPlainOrderInColumn

                                                           int columnNumber)
        Convenience method for setting up columns in ControllerPositionsWindow. Sets up a Plain Order contorller in the column specified and returns the controller of the algo
        Parameters:
        controllerPositionsWindow -
        columnNumber - the column in MikeGridPane where we want the algo setup. first column in number 1 not zero!
        Returns:
